description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Iron Core. Your space fleet is launching an all out attack against the enemy. Your mission is to be the diversion. This is a suicide mission, last as long as you can to give your fleet the distraction needed to launch a surprise attack.
description.short: Welcome to Iron Core. Your space fleet is launching an all out attack against the enemy. Your mission is to be the diversion. This is a suicide mission, last as long as you can to give your fleet the distraction needed to launch a surprise attack.
